main event: An unusual light flashing various colors was observed in Lakewood, California on November 8, 1957.
interesting points: The sighting lasted between 3 to 4 minutes,The object was described as having an oblong shape with bright lights,Witnesses reported clear visibility and good weather conditions during the observation,The conclusion of the observation was that it was identified as a balloon,The report does not contain actual photographs but is rather a scanned document of a UFO report.
sighted object: an unusual light flashing various colors
